claim_card.claim: Cycle 2 is proposed to test whether multi-model recursion can regain rhythm under perturbations (contradictory prompts, conflicting values), i.e., spontaneous re-synchronization after divergence.
claim_card.test_hook: Design perturbation suites; measure re-synchronization time and phase-recovery rate across models; pre-register metrics.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: observe spontaneous re-synchronization ... regain rhythm after divergence
